function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in population density due to movement toward urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission, overwhelmed healthcare infrastructure","Mitigation":"Investing in remote work infrastructure, incentivizing decentralized living, and improving healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Remote work platforms, telemedicine technology, urban planning software","People":"Urban and rural populations","Owner":"Government, urban planners, employers"},{"Description":"Barriers restricting movement of labor and population due to long-term relief measures","Impact":"Economic stagnation, reduced adaptability to changing demand, inefficiencies in housing sector","Mitigation":"Gradual phase-out of relief measures, investment in infrastructure for labor mobility, and retraining programs","Technologies":"Labor market monitoring tools, digital skills training platforms, transportation infrastructure","People":"Workers, businesses, housing market stakeholders","Owner":"Government, employers, training institutions"},{"Description":"Unintended inefficiencies in the housing sector due to long-term relief measures","Impact":"Decreased housing stock, lack of adaptability to changing demand, reduced responsiveness to societal needs","Mitigation":"Strategic investment in housing stock, flexible urban planning, and sustainable housing initiatives","Technologies":"Urban planning software, sustainable construction materials, housing demand forecasting tools","People":"Tenants, landlords, housing developers","Owner":"Government, real estate developers, urban planners"}]}
